Detailed Description

Create a list of recent post's.

Member Function Documentation

◆ init()

RecentPosts::init ( )

initialize the class.

◆ setContainerClasses()

RecentPosts::setContainerClasses (   $setContClasses)

Set classes for container element.

◆ setContainerType()

RecentPosts::setContainerType (   $setContType)

Define what kind of element that is going to be used as container element. That mean's the top element that surrounds the list items.

Default container element is ul.

◆ setElementClasses()

RecentPosts::setElementClasses (   $setElemClasses)

Set classes for list elements.

◆ setElementType()

RecentPosts::setElementType (   $setElemType)

Define what kind of element that is going to be used as list item

Default element is li.

◆ setItemsNumber()

RecentPosts::setItemsNumber (   $setItemsNum)

Define how many item's that is going to be displayed.

Default number is 10.

◆ setOrderAfter()

RecentPosts::setOrderAfter (   $setOrder)

What kind of post the list is going to be sorted after.

Default order is post.

Avaliable post types

  • date
  • author
  • title
  • modified
  • random
  • none

◆ setPostType()

RecentPosts::setPostType (   $setPType)

Define what post type that is going to be listed.

Avaliable sortings

  • date
  • author
  • title
  • modified
  • random
  • none

Default post type is date.

◆ setSortingDirection()

RecentPosts::setSortingDirection (   $setSortingDirection)

Define the direction of the list.

Avaliable options

DESC ASC
